MemoryInfobox.next: To the Edge of the World

General_Description: '''Star-Crossed Lovers''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''My lover lived in the [[Petrified Valley]] and I, in the [[Ancient Pearl]]. To [[Eresos]] I had to go in order to see my girl. But there was a sonorous crack halfway through, and blue was what I reaped. The wooden behemoth groaned and creaked, and at the bottom of the river we began to sleep.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving, located underwater on the broken bridge that linked [[Ancient Pearl]] and [[Petrified Valley]] to the south.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
